products.title: Apple IPhone 14 Pro Max 6.7'' 6GB 256GB ROM IOS 16 - Space Black
products.description: The best iPhone ever, version 2022, size XL - we have the iPhone 14 Pro Max. The list of novelties this year includes the notch morphing into a pill, the introduction of an Always-On display, and an all-new primary camera - and while you can get all of that on the 14 Pro, the extra screen estate and longevity coupled with the Max's 'ultimate' status mean it has a market niche of its own.  The Face ID notch that's been with us since the iPhone X was nobody's favorite, and perhaps its reincarnation as a pill is a step towards its eventual removal. But not before turning the eyesore into a feature - the pill is a Dynamic Island of notifications, blurring the line between hardware and software.  In a similar vein is the Always-On display - a software feature only made possible now in Apple's world thanks to LTPO displays being able to ramp down to 1Hz refresh rate.  A massive increase in brightness is also among the key developments this year, this one solely in the hardware department.  Late to yet another party, Apple finally joins virtually every other manufacturer and introduces a camera with a Quad Bayer type sensor - the specs on the 48MP main unit don't read like any other, so apparently, it's an exclusive design. The telephoto remains unchanged, but the ultra-wide has gotten a sensor size upgrade, while the front-facing one now features autofocus (and even OIS).  On the hardware front, there's the mandatory chipset update, of course, and little else worth mentioning. Well, there's the blanked-out SIM card slot. Crash detection and emergency sort-of satellite connectivity are also on the list of new features combining software and hardware.  iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max do not include a power adapter or Ear Pods. Included in the box is a USB‑C to Lightning Cable that supports fast charging and is compatible with USB‑C power adapters and computer ports.  We encourage you to re‑use your current USB‑A to lightning cables, power adapters and headphones that are compatible with these iPhone models. But if you need any new Apple power adapters or headphones, they are available for purchase.

products.title: TECLAST P80 Tablet PC - 2GB RAM 32GB ROM - 4000 MAh Battery - 8 Inches - Android 11 - WiFi Only - Online Class
products.description: The RogueGE8300 gpu from PowerVR has intelligent enhancement algorithms that optimize color effects and display details to give you a more shocking and realistic video and audio entertainment experience. Hd wide Angle screen The P80 has an 8-inch wide viewing Angle IPS screen with 1280x800 HD resolution. With 16:10 golden display ratio, let your viewing experience to the next level. Mainstream capacity combination easily expands inventory 2GB DDR4 memory for running with 32GB eMMC5.1 for low power consumption and high performance. TF card can be used to achieve easy expansion of storage capacity. Stylish body with narrow edges 6mm narrow edge design with 8 inch small ruler, so that P80 can easily control; Portable portable cinema. Wifi6 helps you connect the world at high speed The P80 comes with faster WiFi6 network access; Faster and smoother than WiFi5; Bluetooth 5.0 brings you the amazing experience of low-power wireless headphones. Before and after the double shot is wonderful The P80 is equipped with a 300,000-pixel selfie camera on the front and a 2-megapixel camera on the rear for video chat and recording. The Android 11 operating system prevents privacy leaks The newly upgraded Android 11 intelligent operating system can realize single authorization management for app, preventing app from excessively obtaining unnecessary user information and disclosing it, making personal information more secure and tablet running more smoothly.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy A14 6.6" 4GB RAM/128GB ROM Android 13 - Black
products.description: LONG LASTING BATTERY: Stay ready for today’s surprises with the fast charging, long-lasting battery of Galaxy A14 4G; Confidently handle work while on the go and play your favorite games with a battery that gives your charger a break  4G AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: Enjoy playing games and streaming with virtually lag-free 4G and the fast, reliable processor of Galaxy A14 4G; Download and share content quickly with a phone that keeps up with the speed of life  EXPANDABLE STORAGE: Live and relive your favorite experiences with the expandable memory of Galaxy A14 4G; Savor those unforgettable moments with 128GB of internal memory and room for up to 1TB more when you add a microSD card  VERSATILE CAMERA EXPERIENCE: Capture amazing selfies with a 13MP front camera and get all the action — whether that’s the bright smiles of friends or stunning sunsets — in high res that will take people’s breath away  INFINITE DISPLAY: Press play and experience games and videos like never before with a 6.6" edge-to-edge screen; Catch all the details and an adaptive 90Hz Infinity-V FHD+ display that makes enjoying your favorite shows easy  STYLISH, DURABLE, PRACTICAL: Take on your day confidently with the durable, modern design of Galaxy A14 4G; Fit with a simple yet classy finish, it’s sure to impress and slide in and out of your hands with ease  VIDEOS CALLS GO WITH YOU: Keep your group conversations going with Google Meet when switching devices; Use Google Meet to start a video chat on your Tab, and then continue the call on your phone as you head out the door  FAST FILE TRANSFERS: Send your files to another Galaxy device with Quick Share; Transfer a photo or video from your Galaxy phone, Tab or Book to other nearby Galaxy devices and vice versa; It’s super easy to move files

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S21+ 5G 6.7" 8GB RAM/256GB ROM Android 11 - Black
products.description: Meet the epic new Galaxy S21+ – our latest device from the Galaxy Series offering you the best in cameras, helping you capture moments the best way you could. It comes with an array of cameras – a 64MP telephoto for detailed shots, a 12MP ultra wide to accommodate more, a 12MP wide to take the regular shots, a depth camera to add more life to portraits, and a 10MP front to capture your best selfies.  Complementing it are amazing features, such as Bright Night – your night shots wouldn't be the same. Select the best shot with Single Take. Capture high-resolution 8K videos, super-smooth with Super Steady, and save 33MP stills from it with 8K Video Snap.  It's the phone that will make every day epic. Once done capturing, you can view your lovely work on the stunning 6.7-inch Infinity-O Dynamic AMOLED 2x Display with 120Hz refresh rate for super-slick scrolling. If you want to share it, or fancy streaming more content, tap into HyperFast speeds with 5G.  Store all that content on the more-than-generous 128GB or 256GB of internal space. Running the device is an all-new 5NM processor – offering more efficiency and performance, ensuring you have the best experience. Powering the phone is a 4800mAh battery – which you can charge wirelessly or with Super Fast Charging – and when someone needs some of that charge, share with PowerShare.     Zoom in close with 30X Space Zoom, and take photos and videos like a pro with our easy-to-use, multi-lens camera. Smartphone.Display resolution maximum:3200 x 1440 pixels. Capture your life’s best moments in head-turning, super-smooth, cinema quality 8K Video. Create share-ready videos and GIFs with multi-cam recording and automatic, professional-style effects. 64MP camera captures and shares detailed portraits, stunning landscapes and crisp close-ups. Intuitively manages your cellphone’s usage, so you can go all day without charging. Experience next-generation connectivity for everything you love to do: more sharing, more gaming, more experiences. Battery power consumption depends on usage patterns and results may vary.

products.title: XIAOMI Redmi Note 12 Smartphone 6.67" GOLED Display 120Hz
products.description: The Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 features a 6.67-inch touch screen. The eight core Snapdragon 685   processor runs Xiaomi Redmi Note 12.     The Xiaomi  Redmi Note 12 has a 48MP rear camera and a 8MP front camera for selfie.     The Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 runs Android 12.0 with a battery capacity of 5000 mAh.        Unique moment, authentic     Capture your best moments with a 48 megapixel rear camera and review them anytime. In addition, the device also has a 8 megapixel front facing camera, so you can take interesting selfies or make video calls.        More noteworthy content     With a 6.67-inch AMOLED screen, you can enjoy strong colors and higher clarity in all content.        Everything you need     Its 6GB memory is exactly what you need to use the most important functions, such as calling, messaging, browsing, and running common applications such as social media or multimedia.        Face recognition enhances security     Bring the device closer to your face and immediately unlock it. Its precise facial recognition technology ensures fast and safe access to your device.        Plug with longer battery life     ! With a 5000mAh super battery, you can play games, watch TV, or work longer without charging.     The space you need     Use 128GB of internal storage space to download your favorite applications and save all the photos and videos you want.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy A04e 6.5" 3GB RAM/64GB ROM Android 12 - Black
products.description: The newest Samsung Galaxy A04e runs on Android 12 with One UI Core 4.1 on top and features a 6.5-inch HD+ PLS LCD display. The display has a waterdrop-style notch at the centre to house the front camera. It is powered by an unnamed 2.3 Hz octa-core SoC, along with 3GB of RAM.  For optics, the Samsung Galaxy A04e carries a dual rear camera setup that houses a 13-megapixel primary sensor with an f/2.2 lens and a 2-megapixel depth sensor paired with an f/2.4 lens. For selfies and video chats, the smartphone has a 5-megapixel selfie camera sensor at the front with an f/2.2 lens.  Samsung Galaxy A04e comes in 64GB storage options and the onboard storage can be expanded via a microSD card (up to 1TB). Connectivity options on the new Galaxy A-series phone include 4G LTE, Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, and Bluetooth v5. The phone also includes the Samsung Knox security feature. Sensors onboard include accelerometer, light sensor, and proximity sensor.  Screen: 6.5-Inch Display SIM: Dual Nano SIM Memory: 3GB RAM, 64GB ROM CPU: Octa Core Operating System: Android 12 Camera: 13MP + 2MP Rear Camera Camera : 5MP Front Camera Bluetooth : Yes GPS : Yes WLAN : Wi-Fi 802.11- b/g/n Wi-Fi Direct Battery: Non removable Li-Po 5,000mAh battery

products.title: XIAOMI Poco C40 6.71" 4GB RAM/64GB ROM Android 11 - Poco Yellow
products.description: Poco C40, 4GB/64GB Memory, 6000 MAh Battery  The Xiaomi Poco C40 has a 6.71-inch HD+ screen, 5MP selfie camera inside the notch, and is powered by a new JR510 Octa-Core SoC developed by JLQ Technology. It has up to 4GB of RAM, and packs a 13MP main camera along with a 2MP depth sensor.  The full IPS display provides quality enhanced features, such as optimal viewing angles, color accuracy, top invariable color reproduction and better mobile power consumption.The weight of Xiaomi Poco C40 is about 7.16 oz with battery, which is average compared to most of the top smartphones with same size.  The phone runs Android 11 with MIUI 13, has a leather-like textured back that makes it smudge and fingerprint-resistant, features a rear-mounted fingerprint scanner and packs a 6000mAh battery with support for 18W fast charging.  Octa-Core JR510 (4 x 2.0 GHz + 4 x 1.5 GHz) processor, Mali-G52 GPU 4GB RAM with 64GB internal storage, expandable memory up to 1TB with microSD Android 11 with MIUI 13 for POCO Dual SIM (nano + nano + microSD) 13MP rear primary camera with f/1.8 aperture, 2MP depth sensor with f/2.4 aperture 5MP front camera Rear-mounted fingerprint sensor 3.5mm audio jack, FM Radio Dimensions: 169.59×76.56×9.18mm;Weight: 204g Dual 4G VoLTE, Wi-Fi 802.11 ac (2.4GHz + 5GHz), Bluetooth 5.0, GPS + GLONASS, USB Type-C 6000mAh (typical) battery with support for 18W fast charging

products.title: Samsung Galaxy A03 Core, 2GB/32GB Memory - Copper
products.description: Expand your view to the 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display of Galaxy A03 Core and see what you've been missing. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content looks its better—sharp, crisp and clear. Easy on the eyes and the hands Galaxy A03 Core combines soft curves and a textured back for an enhanced grip as its expansive, smooth display allows you to fully enjoy videos. And a striped pattern near the camera adds style and catches your eye.   Snap stunning photos, front and back Capture clear, beautiful photos of your favorite moments with Galaxy A03 Core's bright 8MP Main Camera. Or turn it around and use the 5MP Front Camera to put the spotlight on you.
